//Spidy.c
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <iostream>
#include <queue>
#include <set>
#include <algorithm>
#include <math.h>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <map>
using namespace std;
//Input macros
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define sc(n) scanf("%c",&n);
#define sl(n) scanf("%lld",&n)
#define sf(n) scanf("%lf",&n)
#define ss(n) scanf("%s",n)
#define mem(a,b) memset(a,b,sizeof(a))
#define f(i,a,b) for(ll i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define frev(i,a,b) for(ll i=a;i>=b;i--)
#define maX(a,b) ((a)>(b)?a:b)
#define miN(a,b) ((a)<(b)?a:b)
#define ll long long
#define pb push_back
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define fs first
#define sn second
int main()
{
	int t,n;
	si(t);
	while(t--)
	{
		si(n);
		if(n%2==1 || n==2 || n==4 || n==10) printf("RIDICULOUS\n");
		else if(n==18 || n==12 || n==6)printf("NO\n");
		else printf("YES\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
